title: Arturia Spark EDM v1.7.2-R2R [deepstatus]
description:
Arturia Spark EDM v1.7.2





Arturia's Spark EDM virtual instrument is an impressively comprehensive production suite that's perfect for DJs, producers, or any musician interested in creating cutting-edge electronic dance music. From the massively expansive sounds of tech house and the jarring analog bass of dubstep to full minimalist ghetto tech rigs, Spark EDM packs an amazing collection of 480 sounds into 30 complete kits. What's more, the highly flexible software layout is based on the extremely intuitive and ultra-playable Spark environment, so you'll be up and running in no time with Arturia Spark EDM.


        Arturia Spark EDM Virtual Instrument at a Glance:

   All the right sounds for producing top-quality electronic dance music
   Packed with a killer collection of quality effects and real-time processors
   Easy integration into the rest of your live-performance or studio rig


All the right sounds for producing top-quality electronic dance music
First things first, Arturia Spark EDM comes fully loaded with the sounds you need to create any flavor of modern electronic dance music. With all of the stabs, one-shots, special effects, and other sounds onboard, it's totally absurd to write Spark EDM off as a drum machine. Between its versatile sample playback, realistic virtual analog, and powerful physical modeling engines, you can easily create entire records using nothing but this fantastic virtual instrument.

Packed with a killer collection of quality effects and real-time processors
Adding dynamic and exciting elements to the projects you create in Arturia Spark EDM is as easy as firing up one of its amazing effects processors. Choose from deep reverbs and delays, sound-savaging distortions, and cool performance slicing and looping modes. An X-Y pad (easily mappable to your MIDI controller) provides several layers of extensive real-time control, and with 14 effects in total to draw from, you'll find endless ways to enhance your Spark EDM projects.

Easy integration into the rest of your live-performance or studio rig
Arturia clearly built Spark EDM to play well with other music-production systems. In addition to running in standalone mode, Spark EDM lets you upgrade your DAW with both its sounds and its ultra-cool step sequencer. Spark EDM is also a wonderful tool for anyone who's even a little MIDI savvy. In fact, you can map just about any parameter you'd care to map on your hardware controller or keyboard, which makes Arturia Spark EDM an incredible live performance tool.




             Arturia Spark EDM Virtual Instrument Features:

   A purpose-built virtual instrument that's perfect for producing electronic dance music
   480 instruments make use of Arturia's impressive Sample playback, Virtual analog and Physical modeling engines
   30 different kits cover progressive house, tech house, minimal, techno, dubstep, and more
   Unparalleled sound quality based on virtual analog synthesis (TAE) and high-resolution sampling
   Packed with 960 pre-programmed patterns, that you can customize or build from to meet your needs
   FX Pad, Looper, Slicer, and Real-time automation on all parameters provide cool live-performance options
   14 high quality effects include Multiband Compressor, Reverb, Sub generator, Destroyer, Bit crusher, Multiband EQ, Chorus, Delay, Distortion, Phaser, Plate reverb, Flanger, Space pan, and Limiter
   Complete music-production environment provides an intuitive workflow
   Powerful step sequencer makes track creation a breeze
   PC, RTAS, VST
   Flexible MIDI integration provides playability from any MIDI keyboard or drum pad controller



                          Arturia Spark EDM:

Standalone Virtual Instrument
Supported Computer Format PC
Supported Plug-In Formats PC, RTAS, VST
Hardware Requirements - PC 2 GHz CPU, 2 GB RAM, 2GB free hard disk space
OS Requirements - PC Windows XP/Vista/7
